================    ===============================
    character           description
    ================    ===============================
       -                solid line style
       --               dashed line style
       -.               dash-dot line style
       :                dotted line style
       .                point marker
       ,                pixel marker
       o                circle marker
       v                triangle_down marker
       ^                triangle_up marker
       <                triangle_left marker
       >                triangle_right marker
       1                tri_down marker
       2                tri_up marker
       3                tri_left marker
       4                tri_right marker
       s                square marker
       p                pentagon marker
       *                star marker
       h                hexagon1 marker
       H                hexagon2 marker
       +                plus marker
       x                x marker
       D                diamond marker
       d                thin_diamond marker
       |                vline marker
       _                hline marker
    ================    ===============================
